agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Land & Resource Management TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 30, 2019 PLACE: E2.012 CHAIR: Rep. Tom Craddick SB 175 Perry Relating to eminent domain reporting requirements for certain entities. SB 1213 Nichols Relating to the exchange of certain state property in Orange County by the Public Safety Commission. HB 957 Miller | et al. Relating to the use of sales tax revenue collected under certain contracts. HB 958 Miller | et al. Relating to the release and inclusion of extraterritorial jurisdiction by a municipality involving certain areas. HB 3856 Toth Relating to the costs of conducting a traffic study on the effects of a development project proposed to be located in the county. HB 4080 Dominguez Relating to the applicability and enforcement of building and fire codes in the unincorporated areas of a county; authorizing a fee. HB 4734 Oliverson Relating to the creation of the Green Tree Park Municipal Utility District; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 4741 Smith Relating to the creation of the Grayson County Municipal Utility District No. 5; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
